name: Memory Lane (itch) (Hevhere)
description:
A boy wakes up from a confusing dream where everyone forgot who he is, as he progress in his day he realizes that his reality has shifted and, indeed, everyone has forgotten who he is.

As he keeps having this crazy encounters where no one has memories of him, he finds an Ice Cream Dude, whom (guess what), sells ice cream... and as he tastes the ice cream, he wakes up in his room again, just to find out that he was still sleeping this whole time and a Demon has been controling his dreams, but he can't do nothing because the Demon makes him fall asleep again.

The boy's journey starts as he tries to find the Ice Cream Dude again, so he can wake up definitely and defeat the Demon in his room and return to his reality.
